tool_description: Collects and validates temperature readings from refrigeration units, freezers, cooking equipment, and holding areas to verify compliance with food safety temperature requirements.

equipment_ids.description: List of equipment identifiers to collect temperature data from

start_time.description: Start of data collection period (ISO 8601 format)

end_time.description: End of data collection period (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Invalid time range: Ensure start_time is before end_time and both are valid ISO 8601 timestamps.
Equipment not found: One or more equipment_ids do not exist or are not accessible.
Invalid temperature unit: Use either 'celsius' or 'fahrenheit'.
Data collection failed: Unable to retrieve temperature data for specified time range.
usage: Provide equipment_ids array, start_time, and end_time for the data collection period. Optionally specify temperature_unit. The tool returns temperature readings with compliance status for each piece of equipment.

collection_summary.description: Summary of temperature data collection results

compliant_equipment.description: List of equipment IDs with temperatures within acceptable ranges

non_compliant_equipment.description: List of equipment IDs with temperature violations

average_temperatures.description: Average temperature readings for each equipment unit
